control.description-key: A visually appealing tile control for Yes/No fields with configurable Fluent UI icons and labels

property.name: iconYes
property.description-key: Fluent icon name for Yes state (e.g., Checkmark, Home, Car, Lightbulb, Wrench, Fire, Gauge)

property.name: iconNo
property.description-key: Fluent icon name for No state (e.g., Dismiss, Warning, DismissCircle)

property.name: labelText
property.description-key: Text label to display below the tile (leave empty to hide)
